name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForAbnormalFindingsInSpecimensFromRespiratoryOrgans
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Abnormal Findings in Specimens from Respiratory Organs
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to liver cirrhosis.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes histological, immunological, microbiological, and other unspecified abnormal findings in specimens from respiratory organs and thorax.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes abnormal levels of enzymes, hormones, other drugs and biological substances, and nonmedicinal substances in specimens from respiratory organs and thorax.)
